description: Updates a model version. Updating a model version retrains an existing model version using updated training data and produces a new minor version of the model. You can update the training data set location and data access role attributes using this action. This action creates and trains a new minor version of the model, for example version 1.01, 1.02, 1.03.

parameters.name: externalEventsDetail
parameters.description: The details of the external events data used for training the model version. Required if trainingDataSource is EXTERNAL_EVENTS. The Amazon S3 bucket location for the data. The ARN of the role that provides Amazon Fraud Detector access to the data location.

nested_params.name: dataLocation
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 bucket location for the data.

nested_params.name: dataAccessRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the role that provides Amazon Fraud Detector access to the data location.

parameters.name: ingestedEventsDetail
parameters.description: The details of the ingested event used for training the model version. Required if your trainingDataSource is INGESTED_EVENTS. The start and stop time of the ingested events. Timestamp of the first ingensted event. Timestamp of the final ingested event.

nested_params.name: ingestedEventsTimeWindow
nested_params.description: The start and stop time of the ingested events.

nested_params.name: startTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp of the first ingensted event.

nested_params.name: endTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp of the final ingested event.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A collection of key and value pairs. (dict) --- A key and value pair. A tag key. A value assigned to a tag key.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: A value assigned to a tag key.

nested_items.name: modelVersionNumber
nested_items.description: The model version number of the model version updated.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the updated model version.
